event.title: January Meetup
event.description:
Our first meet-up of 2017 brings us a great range of topics from some great speakers and is generously sponsored and hosted by Just Eat. As usual, expect tasty pizza and refreshments at the venue and further discussions at a nearby pub afterwards. 

Speakers

• David Taylor - Kotlin 

• Paul Freeman - Selecting BaaS

• David Branton - Modular Architecture in Android apps

Time table: 

• 18:00-18:15 - organisers/volunteers arrive

• 18:30 doors open / pizza arrive

• 19:00 Intro by SWmobile organiser (thank sponsors, venue admin i.e toilets, fire exits)

• 19:05 talk one

• 19:25 5 min comfort break

• 19:30 Talk two 

• 19:50 5 min comfort break

• 19:55 Talk three

• 20:30 finish up and head to the pub (TBA)

• 20:45 Volunteers leave after helping tidy up
